name: Arkanoid Revised
overview:
In this hack, the game’s graphics have been improved and the game design was revised with more modern play kept in mind. More sense is made out of the continue and level skip cheats, which were almost always used on every play, so now those features have been properly adapted into the main game.

The list of changes is as follows:

ADDED:
-holding the B button greatly increases vaus’ move speed
-new warp pill system

CHANGED:
-continue option available from the title menu after a game over (the cursor is moved to it automatically to prevent “new game” accidents)
-starts with 6 lives (on new game and continue)
-displays up to 9 lives on the HUD (originally only 6)
-graphics

NEW WARP PILL SYSTEM:
-the warp pill no longer creates the warp gate automatically
grabbing a warp pill sends it to the inventory
-pressing SELECT spends a warp pill and opens a warp gate
-entering the warp gates sends you 2 levels ahead instead of just skipping the current level
-starts with 3 warp pills on a new game
-the amount of warp pills is kept upon continuing
-warp gate point bonus reduced from 10,000 to 5,000
-displays up to 6 warp pills on the HUD (new feature)
-chances for warp pill drop slightly increased
